title: Cryptoda
left_description: Dollar-cost averaging (DCA) is an investment technique of buying a fixed dollar amount of a particular investment on a regular schedule, regardless of the asset price.
right_description: Cryptoda connects with your favorite exchanges to automatically buy your selection of coins every day. Ride the ups and downs with ease knowing we're buying for you every step of the way.
right_offer: Cryptoda is currently invite only. If you want access please enter your email address and we'll send you the link.
small_offer: Let Cryptoda buy your favorite coins every day, ensuring you never buy the top!
